pr_title: NIFI-7119 Implement boundary checking for Argon2 cost parameters

timeline.bodyText: Should be long rather than double.
timeline.author: alopresto

replies.bodyText: As 2^32 - 1 is 4*10^12, an int can hold 2^32 possible values, but signed, so the Integer.MAX_VALUE is 2....*10^12. A long is required for all of these fields.
replies.author: alopresto

replies.bodyText: Used Integer to hold unsigned ints.
replies.author: alopresto
